footer.newsletter_subtitle: Stay updated with project showcases and tips
footer.brand_description: Premium masonry services across Texas. Commercial & residential outdoor kitchens, pavers, chimneys, brick & block, fire pits, and stone repairs.

hero.subtitle: Elevating Texas properties with premium outdoor kitchens, custom pavers, elegant fire pits, and structural brick & block work. Built to last generations.

value_stack.desc: We do not cut corners. Whether laying a commercial foundation or hand-carving stones for a residential fire pit, our commitment to excellence remains absolute.
value_stack.licensed_desc: Every project is engineered for lasting structural integrity.
value_stack.fees_desc: We source only the finest, time-tested stone and brick.
value_stack.window_desc: From consultation to cleanup, we treat your property with respect.
value_stack.background_desc: Comprehensive coverage for total peace of mind on every jobsite.

trust.title: Trusted by Texas
trust.subtitle: Our reputation is built on solid stone. See what our clients say about the Texas Prestige difference.

services_landing.heading: Our Core
services_landing.subheading: From sprawling commercial structural work to breathtaking residential outdoor living spaces, our masonry masters deliver on every dimension.

portfolio_detail.cta_subtitle: Texas Prestige Masonry delivers premium craftsmanship and enduring quality.

services_page.broken_desc: Crumbling mortar, cracked brick, and deteriorating stone. We restore masonry to its original glory with expert repair techniques.
services_page.new_desc: Providing unmatched structural integrity and bespoke aesthetic design for Texas's finest residential and commercial properties.
services_page.capabilities_desc: Precision engineering meets generations of stonework tradition. We specialize strictly in premium new installations.

portfolio_page.heading: Built for
portfolio_page.subheading: Explore our curated gallery of custom luxury outdoor living spaces, structural commercial builds, and bespoke brickwork across Texas.
portfolio_page.check_back: We are currently curating our latest high-end installations for this portfolio. Please check back soon.

blog_detail.cta_desc: From outdoor kitchens to structural repairs, our craftsmen are ready.

about_page.standard_desc: We do not compromise. Our name is carved into the quality of our work.

contact_hero.emergency_desc: Crumbling stone or structural damage? Our repair specialists can assess and restore your masonry promptly.
contact_hero.contractor_desc: Dedicated support and project tracking for builders, property managers, and commercial clients.
contact_hero.general_desc: Whether it's a custom outdoor kitchen, new pavers, or a grand fireplace, our craftsmen are ready to bring your vision to life.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Texas Prestige Masonry, we prioritize the security of your personal data. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.section1_intro: We collect information necessary to provide our masonry services, including:
privacy.identity_data: Name, phone number, and email address.
privacy.financial_data: Payment details (processed securely), transaction history, and billing addresses.
privacy.technical_data: IP address and browser data when you use our website.
privacy.section2_intro: Your data is used strictly for operational purposes:
privacy.communication: Sending project updates and estimate details.
privacy.customer_service: Maintaining a history of your projects for warranty and support.
privacy.section3_intro: We do not sell your data. We share data only with trusted partners required to operate our business:
privacy.section4_text: We employ industry-standard encryption (TLS/SSL) for data in transit. All sensitive financial data is handled by PCI-compliant payment infrastructure.
privacy.section5_text: You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you, or to request its deletion. To exercise these rights, please contact our team.
privacy.section6_text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available on this page.
privacy.contact_text: If you have questions about this policy, please contact us.
